headline: MARCH INSTRUMENTS BARREL PLASMA ETCHER 300 WATT
description: Barrel Plasma Etcher with Vacuum Pump   March Instruments, manufacturer of plasma systems, was acquired by Nordson - called Nordson MARCH.
keywords: Ashers driers barrel etchers planar etch
specstable:
Manufacturer March Instruments
Model PM-600
Etcher Type Barrel
Rated Power Output 300 Watts
Reactor Center Cylindrical
Reactor Center Size

Number of Gas Inputs Two Gas
Automatching Network Included Yes

Vacuum Pump Model Varian SD-200
RF Generator Model Seren IPS R300
Accessories (1) Quartz Lattice Tray
Door with viewing window
